DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact strategy develop foster relationship primary care practice community resource address specific unhealthy behavior ( tobacco use , poor nutrition , lack physical activity ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Tobacco use , poor diet , lack physical activity associate leading cause significant morbidity mortality , include coronary heart disease , hypertension , cancer , stroke , diabetes , respiratory dysfunction . One solution decrease unhealthy behavior would better integrate primary care provider community resource , include community public health organization already capacity expertise deliver effective intervention . This project randomize trial evaluate different practice-level intervention link practice community resource decrease unhealthy behavior .
DOC.criteria: Internal medicine family practice Durham Orange county , North Carolina
